Class main.GameBoard

java.lang.Object
main.GameBoard
public class main.GameBoard extends Object
Represents the game board for Bomberman, composed of a 2D array of main.Tile objects. The board contains destructible, indestructible, and walkable tiles, as well as a designated win position that the hero can reach to complete the level.

  • Field Details

    • tileBoard

      public main.Tile[][] tileBoard
      2D array of main.Tile objects representing the board layout.

  • Constructor Details

    • main.GameBoard

      public main.GameBoard(char[][] sampleBoard, int rows, int cols, main.Tile[][] tileBoard)
      Constructs a main.GameBoard from a character sample layout. Initializes the tileBoard with appropriate main.Tile subclasses based on the characters in the sample board.
      Parameters:
      sampleBoard - a 2D character array representing the initial board layout ('D' = destructible, 'I' = indestructible, ' ' = walkable)
      rows - the number of rows in the board
      cols - the number of columns in the board
      tileBoard - the main.Tile array to populate with main.Tile objects

  • Method Details

    • getRows

      public int getRows()
      Returns:
      the number of rows in the board

    • getCols

      public int getCols()
      Returns:
      the number of columns in the board

    • getWinCoordinateX

      public int getWinCoordinateX()
      Returns:
      the X-coordinate (row) of the win/exit position

    • getWinCoordinateY

      public int getWinCoordinateY()
      Returns:
      the Y-coordinate (column) of the win/exit position

    • displayBoard

      public void displayBoard(main.Hero bomberman, object.Bomb bomb)
      Displays the current state of the board in the console. The display shows: - main.Hero's position using its symbol - Active bomb as 'B' - Win position as 'E' if not covered by a destructible tile - All other tiles by their type character
      Parameters:
      bomberman - the hero object to display on the board
      bomb - the bomb object to display if active

    • destroyTile

      public void destroyTile(int row, int col)
      Destroys a destructible tile at the specified coordinates. The tile is replaced with a main.WalkableTile, allowing movement through it.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the tile to destroy
      col - the column index of the tile to destroy Precondition: The coordinates must be within the bounds of the board
